extracted_playbook.title: Update to CNCSoft-G2 v2.1.0.20 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Update the software to CNCSoft-G2 v2.1.0.20 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Contact Delta Electronics Customer Service
extracted_playbook.description: For more information regarding the vulnerability and updates, contact Delta Electronics Customer Service.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Untrusted Links and Attachments
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click on untrusted Internet links or open unsolicited attachments in emails to prevent potential threats.

extracted_playbook.title: Isolate Control Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Avoid exposing control systems and equipment to the Internet. Place systems and devices behind a firewall and isolate them from the business network.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use a secure access method, such as a virtual private network (VPN).

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement CISA Recommended Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets as detailed on the ICS webpage at cisa.gov/ics.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.
